title: 12/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Tom Tolbert
itunes:title: 12/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Tom Tolbert
description:
Tom Tolbert talks to Dan about how it felt when the Warriors selected Steph Curry in the draft. Tom says the Warriors should thank the Timberwolves for allowing them to draft Curry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
